attributes.additional_details: They need to open everything on March 8th with the schools and let us live our lives with no masks and no social distancing!
attributes.background:
No more lockdowns, it's as simple as that!

It has destroyed millions of lives!

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Repeal Coronavirus Act and end all Covid-19 restrictions: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561995

Referendum on current restrictions and any further lockdowns: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/551539
